pageProduct.name: Swisse Beauty Collagen Glow Powder 120g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Beauty Collagen Glow Powder is a great-tasting premium quality blend, specially formulated with Collagen Peptides, Vitamin C, Vitamin E, as well as a blend of acai, goji and grape seed.

Swisse Beauty Collagen Glow Powder is a great-tasting premium quality blend, specially formulated with:

Collagen peptides from type I and III collagen to help enhance skin elasticity - collagen is a major protein found in the dermis of the skin, where the first signs of aging occur.

Vitamin C to support collagen formation, skin repair and skin firmness.

Vitamins C and E to provide antioxidant support, helping reduce free radical damage to cells in the body.

A blend of acai berry, Himalayan goji berry and grape seed.

Size: 120g

Warnings

Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet. If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional.

Ingredients

EACH SCOOP (6 g) CONTAINS: HYDROLYSED COLLAGEN 2.5g; VITAMIN C (ascorbic acid) 300mg; VITAMIN E (d-alpha-tocopherol from d-alpha-tocopheryl acid succinate) 3mg; ACAI (Euterpe Oleracea fruit juice powder) 49.98 mg; GRAPE VINE (Vitis vinifera extract 4.17 mg) equiv. dry seed
(standardised to contain procyanidins 3.36 mg) 500 mg (min.); HIMALAYAN GOJI (Lycium barbarum fruit juice powder) 49.98 mg.

Directions

Directions for Use
Adult Dosage:
Using the enclosed scoop, mix one level scoop (6 g) with 250 mL of water or juice. Consume once daily, during or immediately after a meal, or as directed by a healthcare professional. Once dissolved, consume immediately. Some settling of the powder may occur after mixing.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C in a cool, dry place.
